
                            
                            <p>微搜→微乐福建麻将→点红包可以直接开个红包然后创建2人房间拉小号进可以得抽奖次数记得用转盘抽 <br> 有人抽到88和18&nbsp;&nbsp;我只抽到2个1.2，4个0.5也还行，没一次钻石 <br> 拉一个好友就可以抽一次<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/05/075645r77oozgbowiy831d.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/05/075645r77oozgbowiy831d.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/05/075646rzb984g5gk9k0j4b.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/05/075646rzb984g5gk9k0j4b.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/05/075647ho5jncq2zojpj2p5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/05/075647ho5jncq2zojpj2p5.jpg"> </p>
